text:
Data Scientist at IBM Science and Technology Center, Moscow

IBM Commerce Research and Development team at IBM Science and Technology center is an experienced distributed team working in the areas of sales forecasting, price optimization, promotion recommendation and other analytical applications development for retail. We are looking for a Data Scientist!

Primary Duties and Responsibilities
o	Participate in development of advanced data analytical solutions for retail
o	Prototype, develop and test new algorithms and enhancements to existing ones based on client data with different characteristics and different business strategies
o	Learn new methods and technologies to drive continuous improvement of our capabilities
o	Position might require international travel for internal or customer meetings and presentations

Required
o	Master (or Specialist or equivalent) degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science or related field
o	Solid background in statistics, applied predictive modeling and machine learning
o	Experience with R/Python
o	Experience with Unix operating system family
o	Fluent English

Preferred
o	PhD degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science or related field
o	Good understanding of MapReduce paradigm and practical experience with Apache Spark
o	Experience with C++ or Scala
o	Participation in Data Science hackathons/challenges, Kaggle, etc

Link:
<https://krb-sjobs.brassring.com/TGnewUI/Search/home/HomeWithPreLoad?PageType=JobDetails&jobId=57812&PartnerId=26059&SiteId=5016&type=mail&JobReqLang=1&recordstart=1&JobSiteId=5016&JobSiteInfo=57812_5016&gqid=118>

Офис в Москва-Сити, гибкий график работы. Зарплата от 100 000 руб, далее в зависимости от опыта. 
Вопросы мне в личку – welcome.
